metadata.title: Rubie's Costume Co Women's Cryptisha Hooded Dress Costume
features: Cryptisha costume includes hooded dress and brooch
Dress features black velvet skirt, red damask chest and flowing bell sleeves, silver belt, embellished trim, and attached hood
Available in sizes small (33 to 35-inch bust, 25 to 26-inch waist) and standard (36 to 38-inch bust, 27 to 30-inch waist)
Pair with coordinating scarlet immortal by Rubie's for a great couple's costume
Rubie's offers holiday and novelty costumes and accessories in sizes and styles for the entire family
description: Cryptisha costume dress features a black velvet skirt, red damask chest and flowing bell sleeves, silver belt, embellished trim, attached hood, and brooch. Rubie's costume company has been bringing costumes and accessories to the world since 1950. As the world's costume leader, we take seriously the mission to make dressing up fun. Mascots, rental quality costumes, masks, wigs, accessories, shoes, and every significant licensed costume you would ever want to wear can be found under the Rubie's brand. Still family owned and still family focused, Rubie's brings you fun for every season Halloween, Christmas, mardi gras, Easter, and all in-between.
